content.en: Spectrum sensing revolution: Researchers have been exploring the use of deep learning algorithms to improve spectrum sensing in cognitive radio systems. These algorithms, such as CNN and RNN, can accurately predict spectrum availability without prior knowledge of primary users. Additionally, techniques like transfer learning and federated learning are being applied to enhance adaptability and simplify the spectrum sensing process. These advancements aim to improve the accuracy and efficiency of spectrum sensing in real-time applications.
content.da: Spektrumsregistreringsrevolution: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af dyb læringsalgoritmer til at forbedre spektrumsregistrering i kognitive radiosystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom CNN og RNN, kan præcist forudsige spektrumtilgængelighed uden forudgående kendskab til primære brugere. Derudover anvendes teknikker som transferlæring og federeret læring for at øge tilpasningsevnen og forenkle spektrumsregistreringsprocessen. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af spektrumsregistrering i realtidsapplikationer.
